bioParagraphs.p: My name is Jaden Hakim Mullings Wiafe.
I am from Canada but my Mom is from Grenada, and my Dad is from Ghana.
I enjoy listening to music and watching anime.
I also I love coding more than anything else.
My goal is to become The World's Leading Inventor.
Before coming to Centennial College, I lived in Jane and Finch.
I started coding in November of 2017 and since then made a book and 2 apps.
My book is called Life and Everything in Between and my apps are called Match and SWITCH!
Well I made another game called Trump vs Kanye but you do not want to play that.

projectsParagraphs.p: Hi, My name is Jaden Mullings - Wiafe. I made a book containing my life and all the things that have happened.
projectsParagraphs.m: Match was the fastest game I have made and I think my best.
projectsParagraphs.s: SWITCH! was the game I took the most time in.

projectsParagraphs.p: Reading this alone, it probably just seems like it will be some simple relationships, and family deaths, right?
projectsParagraphs.m: It is simple, fun, but the graphics are boring, so that is my new goal for it.
projectsParagraphs.s: I basically just considered it a practice app in all, but it was fun to make and I learned

projectsParagraphs.p: Well, my book has, for one, my alcoholic mom, two her abusive boyfriend, and yeah, a lot of cheating females.
projectsParagraphs.m: Personally, I think this game has the capacity to become one of the top, but you will need to see it to believe me
projectsParagraphs.s: It is simple, hard, and challenging, but with no effects, it looked dull.

projectsParagraphs.p: Oh yeah, the ongoing death of friends and family (animals too).
projectsParagraphs.s: I can say for sure that this can became very good with a little bit more effort.

projectsParagraphs.p: If you ever feel like reading something, I say you give it a try, you might find it interesting.
